column4: Guys, whats the keyboard shortcut to move from one workspace to another?
all shortuts have u in system -> preferences -> keyboard shortcuts
my another question is that how do i move something from desktop to /var folder? whenever i try it says that i do not have permission
its a php file that would like to move to /var/www/
use mc this is tools like ortoncommander
if dosent workk install it sudo aptitude install mc
instal it sudo aptitude install c
